definitions: the process or technique of selecting, editing, and piecing together separate sections of film to form a continuous whole

examples.text: montage was a useful device for overcoming the drawbacks of silent film

shortDefinitions: technique of selecting, editing, and piecing together separate sections of film

definitions: a sequence of film made using the technique of montage

examples.text: a dazzling montage of the movie's central banquet scene

shortDefinitions: sequence of film made using technique of montage

definitions: the technique of producing a new composite whole from fragments of pictures, text, or music

examples.text: the play often verged on montage

shortDefinitions: technique of producing whole from fragments of pictures
